Administration.text:
Type:
Diabetes medication
Dosage Forms: 500mg, 850mg, 1000mg; ER 500mg, 750mg, 1000mg
Routes of Administration: PO
Common Trade Names: Fortamet, Glucophage, Glumetza, Riomet

Diabetes_Mellitus_type_2.text:
Take with meals
Hold 48 hours for iodinated contrast
Immediate Release
850-1000mg PO bid
Start 500mg BID or 850mg QD
Increase 500mg qwk or 850mg q2wk
Max 2550mg/day
Extended Release
1000-2000mg PO QD
Start 500mg QD
Increase 500mg qwk
Alt dosing; 1000mg bid
Add 500mg immediate release for inadequate response
Do not crush or chew

Polycystic_Ovarian_Syndrome.text:
Take with meals
Hold for iodinated contrast
Immediate Release
500mg tid
Alt dosing; 850-1000mg bid
Increase as needed
Max 2550mg/day
Extended Release
1500-2000mg QD
Do not crush or chew
Max 2000mg/day
